text:
I want to read special characters from excel sheet and write it to database.
But I am not able to read special characters (Mathematical Symbols like pie, square root)

Regards,
Sagar
creator: sagar.hole@gmail.com

text:
The code is executing from Tomcat web server. 
When I tried to read it using standalone application it is working.

Please help in this.

Regards,
Sagar
creator: sagar.hole@gmail.com
apache@gagravarr.org
text:
Should work just fine...

Can you produce a unit test that shows up the problem? Are you sure your output stream + font supports the appropriate characters? Are you setting the encoding + encoding details on your output appropriately?

creator: sagar.hole@gmail.com
text:
I have provided UTF-8 character set in Servlet, JSP, Server.xml and catalina.bat

Where else I need to provide character set?

We cannot reproduce any problem with the information currently available here, therefore resolving this as WORKSFORME, please reopen with a unit-test that shows the problem if this is still a problem for you.
creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
